name: Dewyplump Collagen Lip Gel
about: What it is:A collagen supporting, non-sticky, tinted lip gel for soft hydrated lips..Formulation Type:Lip Gloss, Liquid Lipstick, Lip Oil.Benefits:Hydrating and Long-wearing.Highlighted Ingredients:- Sepilift: Supports collagen to minimize the appearance of fine lines..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Infuse your lips with this collagen supporting lip gel. The gel-to-gloss formula gives you tinted color and shimmer in one quick swipe. It contours the lips with a three-dimensional effect with visible color and hydration while ultra-filling spheres smooth and hydrate lips.
ingredients: - Sepilift: Supports collagen to minimize the appearance of fine lines. .- Ultra-Filling Spheres: Smooth and hydrate. ..Polybutene, Octyldodecanol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Dipalmitoyl Hydroxyproline, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Trihydroxystearin, Sorbitan Oleate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Glucomannan, Fragrance (Parfum), May Contain (+/-): Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxide (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Manganese Violet (CI 77742), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Red 21 Lake (CI 45380), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140)...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Swipe over bare lips, adding layers for more saturated color. .-Can be worn with or without your favorite lipstick for extra shine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After incorporating the Dewyplump Collagen Lip Gel into my daily routine, I can confidently say it's become a staple in my skincare arsenal. The first thing I noticed was the luxurious gel texture, which glided smoothly onto my lips, instantly providing a surge of hydration. The formula is infused with collagen, and over time, I've noticed a visible improvement in the plumpness and overall appearance of my lips.  What sets this lip gel apart is its long-lasting moisturizing effects. Even after hours of wear, my lips remain soft and hydrated, without any need for constant reapplication. This is especially beneficial during the colder months when my lips tend to become dry and chapped.  Furthermore, the Dewyplump Collagen Lip Gel is free from harsh chemicals and artificial fragrances, making it suitable for sensitive skin types. The gentle formula ensures that my lips never feel irritated or sensitized, even with daily use.  In terms of results, I've been thoroughly impressed. Not only do my lips feel softer and more supple, but they also appear visibly plumper and more youthful. Whether I'm going for a natural look or glamming up for a special occasion, this lip gel provides the perfect canvas for any lip look.  Overall, I wholeheartedly recommend the Dewyplump Collagen Lip Gel to anyone in search of a hydrating, plumping, and nourishing lip treatment. It's a game-changer for achieving healthy, luscious lips, and has earned its place as a permanent fixture in my skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this lip gel!  I love glosses with this sort of creamy, sticky texture, but when applied to the lips this starts acting funny.  At first I thought that I maybe just needed to exfoliate my lips.  That helped a little, but product still started to pill and settle in the fine lines of my lips.  It's almost like this was made for someone with overfilled lips that are perfectly smooth.  The most recent time I applied it, I exfoliated twice, then I used a liquid lip primer and that helped.  I still had the settling and a tiny bit of pilling, but it went away after a while.  Also, it tends to accumulate in the corners of my mouth.  I suggest exfoliating, moisturizing, using a liquid lip primer, doing half a swipe of the lip gel, and applying it at the beginning of your makeup routine.  I noticed it does give a slight plumping look after all the pilling settles out and does feel very hydrating.  I haven't tried it on top of any lipsticks, only lip liner, so I suggest testing ahead of time to see if any lipstick you use plays well with it.  I'm also not a fan of the scent.  It smells almost like they're trying to mask a fake chemically scent with something gourmand.  It's really like for every one thing I like about this product, there's another I don't like.  Overall, I love the color and feel, just remember a little goes a long way, and if you're going to layer, give it a good 5 minutes before you apply more.  3 stars because I like it, but I would not recommend because of how hard it is to work with and others probably won't like the texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot say enough about this product! I absolutely loved this! It‚Äôs not sticky and it left my lips feeling hydrated!! This is an amazing product especially if you‚Äôre looking for something that doesn‚Äôt leave that burning/tingly sticky feeling!!

I would recommend this lip gel to anyone looking for a plump and hydrating look, but also provide skin benefits.

reviews.review_title: GXVE DewyPlump Lip Gel Gives Glassy Lip Look
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hello my name is Michele and I am a Beauty Expert in my 30‚Äôs with fair skin. l am in love with the GXVE DewyPlump Collagen Lip Gel. It is everything I look for in a lipgloss. This Bouquet shade is the perfect lip color to compliment my fair skin. I love how well this lip gel in the shade Bouquet matches my cheek tint in the Bouquet shade. I love how plump and juicy my lips look and feel. My lips feel smoother and more hydrated too. This lip gel starts out sheer with light pigment and you can layer it up for more color and shine. This lip gel has buildable color and shine that is so customizable. I really can‚Äôt get enough of this lip gel. My lips stay shiny all day long. This lip gel is formulated with hyaluronic acid which smoothes and plumps your lips immediately while also hydrating your lips. Collagen boosters keep my lips oh so soft, hydrated and extra plump. The doe foot applicator makes it super easy to apply this lip gel onto my lips. As you apply it to your lips, it feels like butter, it glides so smoothly onto your lips and it spreads evenly. I would suggest this to anyone with a rebellious heart looking for a lip gel that will plump, hydrate and smooth their lips while also smelling amazing too.

I love testing and trying new lip products just because I love them and I‚Äôve been in trying and testing this product for a couple of weeks, this lip gel it‚Äôs fantastic, I like the formula, it‚Äôs thick, and stay for so long on the lips, I apply it in the morning and after maybe 3 hours I still have product on my lips, but that‚Äôs it, only stays on the lips but you don‚Äôt feel like it‚Äôs moisturizing or hydrating, and I didn‚Äôt have any plumping effect as well, so I applied a moisturizer before apply this one, the color it‚Äôs pretty it‚Äôs like a milky pink, the packaging it‚Äôs pretty too and feels so nice and luxurious, I‚Äôll continue using this to see if my lips gets a better look or something for the collagen that the product claim to have on it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: From the moment I applied this lip gel, I felt an instant surge of hydration. Its lightweight, gel-like texture glides effortlessly onto the lips, delivering a burst of moisture that lasts throughout the day. Unlike other lip products that leave my lips feeling dry and parched, the GXVE Dewyplump Lip Gel leaves them soft, supple, and oh-so-kissable.What sets this lip gel apart is its collagen-boosting formula. Infused with nourishing ingredients like hyaluronic acid and peptides, it not only hydrates the lips but also works to plump and smooth fine lines, giving them a fuller, more youthful appearance. With continued use, I've noticed a significant improvement in the overall texture and appearance of my lips.I love how versatile this lip gel is. Whether I'm going for a natural, understated look or a bold, statement lip, the sheer tint adds a hint of color and shine that complements any makeup look. Plus, its non-sticky formula ensures comfortable wear without any tackiness or residue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As a lip gloss connoisseur, I have my pros and cons with this Dewyplump Collagen Lip Gel. First and foremost, the packaging is sleek and the doe-foot applicator is fluffy but big enough to hold a perfect amount of product for each time without needing to get more.   In my honest opinion, a little definitely goes a long way with this product. This is definitely a gel that‚Äôs on the thicker side, Which is my only con. Because of it being a thick gel it does feel a bit heavy on the lips and a bit tacky. I‚Äôm recommending with just the amount the doe-foot picks up, one swipe should be all you need to give you a perfect glossy look and the pigmentation is the biggest plus with this gel. Leaves a beautiful color to your lips and can be built up to add more pigment. If you like thicker glosses, this will be perfect for you to add to your makeup kit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Out of the other Gxve products I've tried this one is my ultimate favorite! I'm not exaggerating when I say this is probably the best lip gloss/gel I've ever tried. It's so thick and creamy that you don't need to do a bunch of swipes. I put one coat on and it's carries me through the day. It's also super pigmented so it only takes one coat to see the color. The lip gel has me highly impressed and I don't say that about a lot of products. Unlike most lip glosses it doesn't make you lips sticky but it gives them a soft hydrated feel. This little tube will last a long time because you don't need to use a bunch of product. Trust me a little goes a long way. Gxve has me hooked on lip gel and I highly recommend for anyone to use it. Especially, those who live in really dry climates would really appreciate it. I'm definitely going to get more colors.

reviews.review_title: Shiny Plumped Lips For the Win
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This plumping vegan formula isn't overly glossy, yet it delivers a lot of shine. I particularly appreciate the soft, subtle of the color. Even better it pairs well with lipsticks, offering long-lasting wear. Overall, it's a versatile lip product that delivers hydration, shine, and a touch of color without feeling heavy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried countless lip products claiming to plump and hydrate, but DewyPlump Collagen Lip Gel truly delivers. From the moment I applied it, I felt a luxurious moisture enveloping my lips, leaving them soft and supple. The collagen-infused formula works wonders, providing a noticeable plumpness that lasts. Say goodbye to dry, lackluster lips ‚Äì DewyPlump is a game-changer!This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: GXVE DewyPlump Collagen Lip Plump pumps up my lips!! OMG I‚Äôm in love with this and how it makes my lips shine and plump.  I highly recommend with 5 stars as it is nice, thick but not sticky on my lips.  The color compliments my features and I think no matter the skin tone, this is a winner for all.  I usually avoid nudes so I was shocked at how much I love this.  It also helped keep my skin protected from the wind and cold of upstate New York. The applicator is nice and thick and not too long so it is easy to apply to my lips without overlapping the lip line.  Another plus is the addition of collagen into the lip plump which my skin desperately needs.  Overall, this is an A ++ and I truly love this product.  Pics speak a thousand words.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The GXVE Dewyplump Collagen Lip Gel is extremely hydrating and better than a gloss. Since it is a gel, it has a thicker consistency than a normal gloss and it has a much longer wear time. If you use too much, it could get a little goopy. As long as you put on a nice thin layer, it is perfect. Even after it wears off, your lips still feel hydrated. It is a very comfortable lip product. Even though it is called dewyplump, it does not make your lips feel tingly or have any kind of burn to it. It does minimize the look of the lines on your lips. I have the shade bouquet, it is a perfect pink with high shine. It has a vanilla scent that is not overwhelming. This lip gel has the most adorable packaging and the applicator is the perfect size. I am looking forward to getting more shades of this lip gel to try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As a beauty enthusiast, I'm always trying out new products and finding those that fit me & my personality. GXVE products exude a punk-rock persona and originality - from their killer packaging, to the bold colors & looks. I've loved everything from GXVE that I've tried, but I think the Dewyplump Collagen Lip Gel is coming in last on my favorites list. It's a beautiful formula that nourishes and conditions my lips, with collagen to help with their firmness and elasticity. I love the way it glides on with its gel-like consistency and smoothness. The shade Bouquet is quite beautiful, compliments my skin wonderfully, and goes fabulously with its match in the Dewyplump Collagen Boosting Cheek Tint. BUT - the unfortunate stickiness of this product is what does it in for me. I can feel my hair getting stuck to my lips whenever I wear it, along with leaving sticky residue on anything I eat or drink. I want to love this product so badly, but the formula just isn't for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not enough can be said for the longevity and wear of this lip gel. Admittedly, it felt thick going on the first application and for a minute took me back to the plasticky glosses of grade school that stick like Shine-o-Matic lacquer on lips. Oh no. Nothing like. Gwen Stefani clearly infuses playfulness in her new beauty line but does so with a very contemporary and upgraded arsenal of ingredients, and this lip gel is a case in point. Pillowy, dewy lips last a full eight-hour day, as does the shine, with one good AM application. With care, I found I was able to eat and drink with minimal transfer and zero stickiness. The gel feels comfortable, light and nourishing however the best part truly is the longevity. I never seem to get to a point where the product feels like it has absorbed or worn off and I need to reapply. The plump consistency that I thought would be a downfall is actually a hero feature in terms of promoting stay. And stay also means not migrating or bleeding over lip lines. The only observation for improvement might be in the area of color, as the gel applies at least a full shade lighter than the color of the tube. The product doesn‚Äôt claim to be full coverage but know it provides more a hint of color than a lip color proper. If you are matching the lip gel to a GXVE cheek tint for instance, the two won‚Äôt be an exact match in color intensity. For me, the best way to wear it is over a regular matte lipstick or stain. The gel creates a glassy shine and instantly elevates lip texture and fullness. I definitely recommend trying this collagen lip gel ‚Äì it will more than likely exceed your expectations.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I grew up listening to No Doubt and Gwen Stefani, and also am a beauty lover, so being able to try Gwen Stefani‚Äôs beauty brand is something that have been wanting to do. The GXVE by Gwen Stefani Dewyplump Collegen Lip Gel in Bouquet comes packaged in this cute little glass bottle with a checkered trim around the lid. The consistency is not too thick and not watery at all. It has a delicious vanilla scent which makes it easy to wear. It is a little sticky but feels moisturizing at the same time and in my opinion the benefits of the moisturizing feeling definitely outweigh the stickiness. I love the way it makes my lips look and feel, they feel so smooth which rarely happens. The color is more sheer than anything so if you want color you might have to add something else underneath it. Because it is sheer I feel like I can wear this lip gel anytime of day, which I have been wearing it everyday because I like it so much. I do really like this lip gel so it most likely will be finding a permanent spot in my purse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After trying other GXVE products I really wanted to love this one too but was really disappointed with it. The GXVE Dewyplump collagen lip gel in Bouquet was the perfect shade for my fair skin tone. Everything sounded so good from the non-sticky formula to the clean and collagen supporting ingredients. It has pretty nice packaging but I thought the tube itself was kind of bulky for a lip gloss. It has a doe foot applicator for easy application. While it did hydrate my lips pretty well it made my lips feel kind of weird. The formula was just way too thick for me and it made all of the lines in my lips very noticeable. The scent was awful and way too strong for me. It was like I was eating a really bad flavored frosting the whole time I had it on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The GXVE Dewyplump Collagen Lip Gel is a quality lip product. I tried this lip gel in shade ‚Äúbouquet.‚Äù I have dark skin and when wearing this product my lips looked like a pale pink-ish white but was semi-sheer. It was quite pigmented, but I could still slightly see my natural lip color coming through. The lip applicator applied an ample amount of product in one swipe, but for more pigment you could apply another swipe, but more than that would feel too heavy.    The GXVE Dewyplump Collagen Lip Gel lasted most of the day, even with eating and drinking. My lips felt soft without feeling sticky, which is a plus on both accounts. I recommend this product and think the color selection is fun but wish darker options were available. If you have dark skin, I would suggest to pick a shade other than ‚Äúbouquet.‚Äù     This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Oily skin

I'm not sure if it's because I'm so used to using clear that the pink feels foreign to me, but I feel like it doesn't look right now on me. That's a me problem though. The gloss definitely has some plumping action. It tingle for a good 30-45 seconds and then subsides. The effects aren't extreme, but definitely noticeable especially if you do the half and half test. This lip gel is a lot thicker and stickier than I care for though so I have to be careful to only add the tiniest amount. Basically, if you love a good thick, opaque, plumping lip gloss with a big fluffy doe foot applicator then this is for sure worth trying.

I have never used a lip gel before trying this one but I‚Äôd say it‚Äôs pretty much like a gloss, maybe just a little thicker than most. Even though it is thick, it‚Äôs not sticky at all, which I love. Often when glosses have such a high some they are sticky. My lips feel plump and hydrated whenever I use this gloss- I‚Äôve been keeping in my everyday purse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin

I was suprised that i enjoyed it as much as i have. I highly recommend this lip gel by GXVE by Gwen Stefani. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved loved lived it looks so glossy and it feels great not greasy it's also super long lasting and it has added benefits it's not just pretty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First anything from GXVE that‚Äôs a lippie!! I‚Äôm in!! I love the formulas for her lip products!!!! So whenever I saw the Lip Gel I was intrigued!!! First I‚Äôve never tried a lip gel formula!! So I didn‚Äôt know what to expect!! reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hi! My name is Kristen and I love testing out new makeup, especially lip glosses. The Dewyplump Collagen Lip Gel from GXVE is long wearing and hydrating. If you want a more bold lip color I would suggest using a different shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: üíÑ Color : Bouquet - pink üëÑ ‚ÄúThis review was collected as part of a promotion‚Äù   Normally I‚Äôm not into the lip gloss world but this one made me fall in love! üíï  The color is a beautiful soft pink that complements my skin tone perfectly. I used it as a top coat of my matte lipstick. üòç Not only does this lip gel provide a gorgeous hue, but it also keeps my lips incredibly moisturized and plump. reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin

I found this shade very, very light. I have a ‚Äúlight‚Äù skin tone, and my cousin has a ‚Äúfair‚Äù skin tone. I don‚Äôt understand how this shows up with barely any pigment on both of us. I would never be able to use this on my lips by itself, but because of the thick consistency, I wouldn‚Äôt like to layer it either. This caused me to just give it away to someone else. It‚Äôd be nice if it at least appeared smooth, but it didn‚Äôt. I didn‚Äôt have high or low expectations and was still very unsatisfied. Plus it‚Äôs not cheap either, so I highly recommend choosing something else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôm going to be honest, this shade is gorgeous but SO not for me haha. It‚Äôs the same shade as my lips so when I apply it, it doesn‚Äôt really show. BUT. The gloss it gives is just STUNNING. It covers my lip wrinkles, and I have dry lips and it even covered that. reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This review was collected as part of a promotion. I am Marilinda a skin care and hair care enthusiast. reviews.review_title: A Little Goes a Long Way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really great lip product! One swipe and you‚Äôre good to go! The shine is stunning. The hydration feels so good. reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin

If I don‚Äôt apply a good quality lip product several times per throughout the day my lips crack, flake, and bleed. I look for lip products that are particularly moisturizing that help my looks feel (and look) good.   GXVE by Gwen Stefani‚Äôs Dewyplump Collagen Lip Gel is a unique formula. The shade Bouquet is a pink color that makes my lips look like my lips (but better!) I like the extra large doe foot applicator and packaging as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dewyplump Collagen Lip Gel. Goodness..this stuff is thick! You only need a small amount for extra glossy lips. reviews.review_title: Beautiful color, long lasting, a bit sticky

reviews.review_title: Sweet Smell, Plump Pout, Picture-Perfect Packaging

reviews.review_text: The GXVE BY GWEN STEFANI Dewyplump Collagen Lip Gel is truly a gem.üíÑ When you open it up, you're greeted with this sweet smell that reminds you of freshly baked cookies.üç™ It makes your lips look plumper and fuller, but without any of that weird tingling sensation that some other lip plumpers have. reviews.review_title: Is good, but a bit heavy.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have it in the shade Bouquet, it feels a bit thick, heavy and it can lump up if I apply too much, it has a sweet fragrance,not overpowering. I do like the shine that it gives my lips, more like a plumped look. My lips feels hydrated but it doesn't last as long on my lips as I would like,  this shade does not offer a lot of pigment and trying to build up it will cause the product to get goopy, heavy and thick, I recommend using little. Since this is collagen infused I will have to see the benefits that claims such as minimizing the appearance of fine lines. But only if I am consistent and use this every day, in which is impossible for me. I don't think this is a must, it is a personal choice. I am cosiderning in grabbing another shade, and as always the packaging is cute!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited and surprised by how much I like GXVE 's Dewyplump Collagen Lip Gel. What I like most about it might be the reason some do not like it. I loved the weight and thickness the lip gel has. It stays on lips hours longer than your average lip gloss. It doesn't have a stickiness on the outside but it seems to seal to your lips quite well. The weight makes it feel very hydrating and protective. It gives the perfect pop of color and major shine. This may be my favorite product in the GXVE line (and I have tried a lot of their products). The packaging is cute and the doe foot applicator is precise. It removes easily with water and face wash, or simply wipe off with cotton square.

reviews.review_title: It didn‚Äôt show on my lips!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this lip gel. I read plump, hydration, and tinted and it got my attention. I need any hydration I can get for my dry lower lip. But sadly, I didn‚Äôt like how sticky the texture is. I feel like my lips are dirty. And they don‚Äôt look plump. I applied one or two layers of the gel. It got very sticky when I applied it and then the sticky feeling went away a little. One thing is true though, they look shiny and glossy. And another good thing is the duration of the lip product. It stays for a while. It doesn‚Äôt smell bad. It definitely helps to make the lips not dry but not after removing it. The color Bouquet doesn‚Äôt show on my lips, it looks clear. It is a pink Barbie color. Also, it is not easy to get the applicator out. I would recommend a stronger color for pigmented lips. And even though it is not my cup of tea, maybe other people like the shiny finish. And they won‚Äôt mind the sticky texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Heavier, thicker feeling gloss. This shade has a little amount of pigment, looks very fresh and spring-y. BUT it does the weird goopy goo string thing if you talk or press your lips together. If you know, you know. It‚Äôs a bit stickier than I expected. I recommend, sort of.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: GXVE dewyplump collagen lip gel is a good one! For starters it comes in the cutest packaging. I love the checker print on all the products I have tried so far. I tried the color bouquet and it is a very light pink color but it is so pretty on! It makes your lips look like glass! It also makes them so soft and sets in the moisture for all day wear. It doesn't really smell like anything either. It does plump your lips but it doesn't have the tingle or burning feeling that most plump glosses tend to have so that was awesome! It does have a little sticky feeling to it but nothing that bothered me to were I didn't like it or not want to wear it. It doesn't leave any lines either around the lips like some colored glosses will do. All together I absolutely loved this product and loved the way it made my lips feel and look! I would totally recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very conditioning , hydrating, and glossy lip product! It feels like a lip mask or lip balm in the lips but looks like a very pretty gloss! I love that it has collagen in it helps to plump the lips and over time hopefully make them look!! I love the color is such a pretty pink you‚Äôre going to need this if you get dry lips because it‚Äôs an instant long lasting hydration! Gwen Stefani is the owner of this brand and I adore her I‚Äôve tried hundreds of lip products and this is definitely one I wanna purchase in every single shade! I know pink lip products are very popular right now so I know your probably thinking of buying if your reading this get this one for sure!! You‚Äôre gonna love it! Pretty pink glossy shine with collegan benifits  hydration!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: At first, I was scared of the color selection since I am of deeper tone and this shade (Bouquet) looks relatively light in the bottle. The packaging is ok but they could‚Äôve went harder. I love this vanilla gourmand scent (they need to bottle it lol). The formula is thick, less is more with this one. It is buttery for sure, maybe too thick. The more I try to blend it in my lips the more it rebels. I have to keep rubbing my lips together to blend, but it feels and looks like pigs have to fly before that happens.   I was expecting to feel that plumping, tingling effect you might find in other plumping glosses but this one doesn‚Äôt do it. I don‚Äôt see a difference in the plumping effect. I like that it is not sticky but this formula reminds me too much of the old school cheap glosses in the beauty supply store. I would get another solely off of nostalgic purposes. I most likely would have loved this gloss more if I tried a deeper shade because this one is ashy on me or pair with a darker lip liner. I prefer this shade better in the cheek tint. So plump or dump?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really good lip gel. It really plumps your lips and it's full of really good ingredients. I love the color.  The texture of this lip gel is different so I'm not use to that. But I really like that it will stay on your lips for a long time. And I love the color, it's a pretty dewy pink. I love that it has collagen and hylouronic acid in it which is good for your skin and lips.  This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the Dewyplump Collagen Lip Gel for the first time after hearing the hype surrounding it. The color Bouquet pink is shiny, and it's transparent, not opaque which is great for layering. It made my lips feel soft, hydrated, and kissable!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The GXVE Dewyplump Collagen Lip Gel in the shade Bouquet is a true game changer in the world of lip products. As someone who's always on the lookout for the perfect combination of hydration, color, and plumpness in a lip product, I can confidently say that this lip gel ticks all the boxes and then some. I tried the shade Bouquet; It's a beautiful soft pink peach hue that adds a beautiful tint to the lips. This collagen infused formula is so luxurious. Not only does it provide a subtle plumping effect, but it also works wonders in terms of hydration! this formula is an absolute dream to apply. Unlike some lip glosses that can feel sticky or tacky, this lip gel feels lightweight. It doesn't have that heavy, greasy feeling that some lip products can leave behind, which is a huge plus in my book.

reviews.review_title: A really glossy treat for my lips
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First of all this product is THICK!! if you don't enjoy a thick, tacky lip gloss then this is definitely not for you. I love it! When you apply the gel-like formula you definitely feel it on your mouth. I got Peony so it has a slight pink sheen. Not opaque. A little goes a long way but once it's on its not going anywhere. it's not gloopy but has the potential to be if you apply too much. It feels hydrating and it stays put for hours. When people comment that it's sticky - I can press/rub my lips together and they don't stick together or get those strings. I would describe it more as a tacky, thick gel. I would 100% get more shades. Also the shine is amazing which gives the illusion of plumping. It doesn't tingle and has that vanilla frosting type fragrance just like the other lip gloss formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am someone who suffers from severe chapped and cracking lips on a daily basis. I apply a lot of lip balm throughout the day, but it just seems to disappear so quickly. This lip gel is an absolute godsend for me! Let me start off by saying this formula is pretty sticky, but I love sticky lip products because they STAY PUT. I applied this early in the morning and there was still remnants of it coating my lips at lunch time! And it keeps my lips so hydrated and soft! The stickiness almost provides a protective barrier. I have even started applying it before bed like a lip mask. It has a strong vanilla cupcake fragrance, which I could do without since fragrances can contribute to irritation. Love the big doe-foot applicator too! This stuff healed my lips and I definitely plan on picking up some other shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for this beautiful gloss but you can't always expect all gel lip glosses to be perfect.It does have a nice applicator but what I really like is that it plumps up your lips with the collagen in it. I really enjoy this corally pink or mauvey color and love how it isn't overly powering color. It was a bummer to me for my hair to stick to my lips as soon as I put it in. It did stay on pretty good and seemed like the gel part of it made it pretty grippy which is a plus if you want it to stay on all day. I just wish it wasn't so sticky but if you grew up in the era where every lip gloss was sticky you probably wouldn't mind. Very pretty cool and a great product I can't complain otherwise so it's hit or miss depending on what you want. This review is a part of a paid promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The lip gel is perfect for achieving a natural yet polished look, especially on the days I don't want to wear much makeup. It is hydrating with a beautiful colored finish. But layering will give me a more intense look if I want to because the product is easily buildable. The Bouquet shade has a pretty soft pink pigmentation and a beautiful shine. I love to apply it on my lips and the matching cheek tint on my cheeks and they give my face a healthy and bright look. It glides smoothly to give the right color to my lip. It is non-sticky, soft and very comfortable to wear throughout the day. It still looked nice several hours later and I didn't feel tacky. If you want a nice natural look this is the product you would love. It is definitely worth a try. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing color! I love it so much. The texture is perfect, lightweight, soft and smooth. I love the ingredients in this lip plump gel. Definitely gives your lips a nice plumpy look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: - I was gifted this gxve beauty dewy plump collagen lip oil for my review.  The beautiful packaging catches my eye . It‚Äôs simple but it‚Äôs luxurious looking. It‚Äôs the cap and color of it I think that draws my eye .  I got the shade bouquet and I really love it , it‚Äôs a beautiful dusty rose color maybe a peach or brighter dusty rose, perfect for spring !  The lip oil has the lightest sweet scent like vanilla , it‚Äôs very subtle.  The texture doesn‚Äôt feel like an oil , it‚Äôs actually very thick ,  if you don‚Äôt enjoy sticky glosses.  I would start clear because this is almost glue thick .  I don‚Äôt mind the texture .  The pigment is ok , even though it‚Äôs a light color it still shows up on my lips ,  brightens them up just a little bit . I haven‚Äôt noticed it marking my lips dry at all . Also I noticed the wand for it is that kind that is staticky and will suck extra lip product back into the container , pump it a few times then hold the lip gloss container upside down above the wand and watch the gloss go up wards back into the tube. I like those ones ,  they are meant to keep too much product from getting onto your lips and wand . Overall this is a nice lip gloss but I‚Äôm not in love with it .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This collagen lip gel looks so beautiful on my lips. This gel formula gives me a tinted color and a bit of shimmer. It is moisturizing so doesn't dry my lips out and is not as sticky as other brands that I have used. I loved the color Bouquet, such a pretty pink color that leaves my face looking fresh and bright. reviews.review_title: It was hate at first sight (and smell)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: 1. SHADE: The colour I picked (Hibiscus) was not at all what it looked like on the pictures: not as bright and vibrant, more like a subdued dusty mauvy nude. (see picture for comparison)  2. SCENT: Not to be dramatic, but when I applied it, I gagged. The coconut sunscreen smell is so gross I had to remove it right away. To give you an idea of how powerful this scent is, after swatching on my hand for the picture and removing it, I can still smell it. ü§¢   3. TEXTURE: This is not what I would call a lip gel.  The texture is so thick and goopy, I know it will gather.  That being said, if you like this type of product and can get past the scent, you might enjoy the shine.   FINAL THOUGHT: This is an immediate return for me and to say I'm disappointed in this product is an understatement. I have rarely hated a lip product as much as I did this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

The lip gel tube has the same checkerboard print on the gunmetal-ish lid I tried this in the shade Bouquet Pink which can be considered a light neutral shade of pink. reviews.review_title: A must have for a neutral look

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who's constantly searching for lip products that provide both hydration and a touch of glamour, I was eager to try out the GXVE Dewyplump Collagen Lip Gel. After incorporating it into my daily routine for a while, here's my honest review. Let's start with the packaging. The lip gel comes in a sleek, compact tube that's perfect for throwing into your purse or pocket for on-the-go touch-ups. I appreciate the simplicity and elegance of the design, which aligns well with the brand's aesthetic. Upon first application, I noticed the smooth, creamy texture of the lip gel. It glides effortlessly onto the lips, instantly providing a boost of hydration. The formula contains collagen-boosting ingredients, which intrigued me as someone who values skincare benefits in my makeup products. While I can't speak to any long-term effects just yet, I do notice that my lips feel softer and smoother after each use. One of the standout features of this lip gel is its versatility. It can be worn alone for a subtle, natural look or layered over lipstick for added shine and dimension. I particularly enjoy wearing it on its own for a low-maintenance, my lips but better kind of vibe. The subtle hint of gloss adds a touch of glamour without feeling sticky or tacky. Speaking of glossiness, I appreciate that this lip gel provides a beautiful, dewy finish without being overly shiny. It strikes the perfect balance between a subtle sheen and a full-on gloss, giving my lips a healthy, luminous appearance. In terms of wear time, I'm pleasantly surprised by how long-lasting this lip gel is. While it may need to be reapplied after eating or drinking, it holds up admirably throughout the day, maintaining its hydrating properties and glossy finish. Another aspect worth mentioning is the scent and taste of the lip gel. It has a subtle, pleasant fragrance that isn't overpowering or artificial. Additionally, it doesn't have a noticeable taste, which is a bonus for those who prefer their lip prod

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The GXVE Dewyplump Collagen Lip Gel is a game-changer for anyone seeking soft, hydrated lips. I was amazed by how instantly plump and moisturized my lips felt upon application. The gel texture glides on smoothly, providing an instant burst of hydration without any stickiness. What sets this lip gel apart is its collagen-infused formula, which works to improve lip texture and elasticity over time. I noticed a significant reduction in dryness and fine lines after regular use. Plus, the subtle dewy finish adds a touch of glamour to my lips, making them look fuller and healthier. Overall, I highly recommend the GXVE Dewyplump Collagen Lip Gel for anyone looking to achieve beautifully hydrated and plump lips.  Furthermore, the packaging is sleek and convenient, making it easy to throw in my bag for on-the-go hydration whenever I need it. The gel comes in a tube with a precise applicator tip, allowing for easy and mess-free application. I appreciate that the formula is free from harsh chemicals and artificial fragrances, making it suitable for sensitive lips like mine. Whether worn alone for a natural look or as a base under lipstick for added hydration, this lip gel delivers impressive results every time. If you're tired of dealing with dry, lackluster lips, give the GXVE Dewyplump Collagen Lip Gel a try‚Äîyou won't be disappointed!

reviews.review_title: Beautiful hydrated shine with a boost of skincare

reviews.review_text: As an Esthetician with a background in makeup artistry I always love to see a skin boosting lip product made with a clean vegan formula. Shade bouquet definitely has some pigment to it but yet also looks pretty natural at the same time and can be layered over other products. I like that all the the lip gels have matching cheek tints. As long as you're ok with the slightly heavy feel of the product this is a winner! I'm rating this a four out of five stars only because the heaviness of the product is pretty noticeable for me. That said I would recommend this for everyday wear for an added touch of plumping glam.   This review was collected as part of a promotion.

I don‚Äôt think this will be my go to lip gloss but it‚Äôs also not the worse I‚Äôve used. I think they missed the mark on texture and formulation. reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôm always looking for a good lip product to try and Gwen Stefani did it again this one is absolutely perfect!

In short, the GXVE Dewyplump Collagen Lip Gel in Bouquet is a must-have for anyone looking for a hydrating, comfortable, and effective lip product that delivers real results.
